statements: DELETE FROM property_development_projects WHERE project_name = 'Downtown Plaza' AND project_location = 'Main Street' AND project_budget > 50000
DELETE FROM property_development_projects WHERE project_id = 101 AND project_name = 'Luxury Apartments'
DELETE FROM property_development_projects WHERE project_location = 'Downtown' AND project_budget > 500000

DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_id = 101;
DELETE FROM zoning_regulations WHERE effective_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM project_properties WHERE zoning_category = 'Commercial' AND forecasted_market_value > 1000000.00;
